answers.answer: No and not even if the lancet was reused.

question: A co-worker gave me a CVS/TRUCHECK Glucose diabetes meter. I did not think about it until after I tried it out. his wife had a lance in to poke you to get blood already in it. He said it was new. I did not see him open and install it. If it was previously used can I catch HIV?Worried!Thanks.
title: HIV from a glucose meter?
